mapper.select: SELECT e.id, c.exercise, c.exercise_area, e.weight, e.count, e.set, e.posture_img, e.done FROM exercise e JOIN category c ON e.category_id = c.id WHERE e.diary_id = #{diaryId};
SELECT e.id, c.exercise, c.exercise_area, e.diary_id, e.weight, e.count, e.set, e.posture_img, e.done FROM exercise e JOIN category c ON e.category_id = c.id WHERE e.id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exercise (category_id, diary_id, weight, count, `set`, posture_img, done) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{diaryId}, #{weight}, #{count}, #{set}, #{postureImg}, #{done});
mapper.update: UPDATE exercise SET category_id = #{categoryId}, weight = #{weight}, count = #{count}, `set` = #{set}, posture_img = #{postureImg}, done = #{done} WHERE id = #{id};
